meanings.definition: Following a formula or set of rules
meanings.sent1: The movie was very formulaic, following the same pattern as many others.
meanings.sent2: Her writing style is quite formulaic, always sticking to a specific structure.
meanings.sent3: The recipe was so formulaic that even a robot could follow it!
meanings.sent4: His approach to problem-solving was too formulaic, lacking creativity.
meanings.sent5: The formulaic nature of the instructions made them easy to understand.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a predictable or standardized format
meanings.sent1: The show's plot was too formulaic, making it boring to watch.
meanings.sent2: The report followed a formulaic structure, making it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations were so formulaic, they looked like they came from a kit!
meanings.sent4: Her speech was too formulaic, lacking any personal touch.
meanings.sent5: The formulaic layout of the website made it user-friendly.
